title: Jimmy Scott - All The Way (1992) (mp3) (jazz) (Twin Peaks)
description:
Jimmy Scott - "All The Way" (1992) (mp3) (128 kbps)


Great album from classic jazz crooner Lil' Jimmy Scott.  He has one of the most distinctive voices you'll ever hear.  This album is great for late night listening, or a romantic candle-lit evening.

Scott has had a long and illustrious career in music, working with many of the greats.  He became known to a younger contemporary audience in 1991 when he appeared in the final episode of David Lynch's smash-hit TV series "Twin Peaks".  Scott was also featured the following year, 1992, on the soundtrack to David Lynch's film "Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me".

Scott was born in 1925, and is still alive at time of writing - currently aged 88.


==
This is Scott's only album available here.  These files are MP3, and it is hoped that this torrent will be better seeded than the (currently un-seeded) FLAC version of this album.
==
